Title: Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF) Contrib
Description: MEF Contrib is a community-developed library of extensions to the Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF), a new library in .NET.
HomeWiki:
Managed Extensibility Framework Contrib

The repository found here is no longer being maintained. All active development has been moved to our new Github repository

Project Description

MEF Contrib is a community-developed library of extensions to the Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF), a new library in .NET.
  • If you are building custom tools and want to share them then MEFContrib will get it out to the masses.
  • If you've got a great idea for new parts/modules than MEF contrib is the place to find developers ready, willing, and able to make it happen.
  • If you use MEF within your org, then MEF contrib is the place to find tools and parts/modules to add to your arsenal.
  • If you want to connect with others who are pushing the bar on MEF development, then this is the place to be.
MEF contrib is about YOU. With your help we can make Managed Extensibility Framework Contrib a vibrant resource for MEF developers world-wide.
